page.title: 17Employment [2]
page.content: My mom works at Westfield Middle School as a cleaner.She scrubs the windows which have fingermarks on but sometimes she is in Mr.Smith's room.On the wall there are birds and there is an eagle's wing. She goes to fetch the mop and bucket from the cupboard. Then she does his room over.There used to be a guinea pig but he died.Then my mom goes to the cloakroom to clean the dust off the window-sill.Then she goes to get the broom,sweeps the cloakroom, puts everything back in the cupboard and comes home. *************************************** My dad works as an insurance agent.He works for Brittanic Assurance in Wolverhampton.He has to go to people's houses collecting money.Then he comes home and has to do a lot of paperwork. Then the next day he has to take it in to his work.
